name: dockwatch
description: Dockwatch monitors Docker container lifecycle events and sends notifications via services like Discord, Telegram, or Email. It helps administrators stay informed about container restarts, fails, or updates through webhooks.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send alerts via Discord, Telegram, Email, and more. Stay informed everywhere

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Integrate with custom notification systems. Flexible alerting

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Get notified when containers fail. Immediate problem awareness

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own container monitoring. Complete control over alerts
